cassandraConfig: scala.collection.immutable.Map[String,String] = Map(keyspace -> advancedspark, table -> item_ratings)
itemRatingsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [userId: int, itemId: int, rating: int, timestamp: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Train The ALS Model
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS

val rank = 10 // this is k
val maxIterations = 20
val convergenceThreshold = 0.01

val als = new ALS()
  .setRank(rank)
  .setRegParam(convergenceThreshold)
  .setUserCol("userId")
  .setItemCol("itemId")
  .setRatingCol("rating")

val model = als.fit(itemRatingsDF)

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS
rank: Int = 10
maxIterations: Int = 20
convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01
als: org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALS = als_de43c30987d4
model: org.apache.spark.ml.recommendation.ALSModel = als_de43c30987d4

paragraphs.title: Generate Recommendations for all Users
paragraphs.text:
model.setPredictionCol("confidence")

val recommendationsDF = model.transform(itemRatingsDF.select($"userId", $"itemId"))

val enrichedRecommendationsDF = 
   recommendationsDF.join(itemsDF, $"items.itemId" === $"itemRatings.itemId")
   .select($"userId", $"items.itemId", $"title", $"description", $"tags", $"img", $"confidence")
   .sort($"userId", $"items.itemId", $"confidence" desc)
   
z.show(enrichedRecommendationsDF.select($"userId", $"itemId", $"title", $"confidence"))

paragraphs.title: Store full recommendations in elasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode

val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "127.0.0.1", "es.port" -> "9200")

enrichedRecommendationsDF.write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql")
  .mode(SaveMode.Overwrite)
  .options(esConfig)
  .save("advancedspark/personalized-als")

z.show(enrichedRecommendationsDF)

paragraphs.title: Show User Factors Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors

val userFactorsDF = model.userFactors.map(row => 
  (row.getInt(0), row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble))
).toDF("userId", "userFactors")
 .sort($"userId" asc)
 .as("userFactors")

z.show(userFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Show ItemFactors Matrix
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vectors
 
val itemFactorsDF = model.itemFactors.map(row =>
  (row.getInt(0), row.getSeq[Float](1).toArray.map(_.toDouble))
).toDF("itemId", "itemFactors")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)
 .as("itemFactors")


z.show(itemFactorsDF)

paragraphs.title: Write the User and item factor vectors to elasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "127.0.0.1", "es.port" -> "9200")

userFactorsDF.select($"userId", $"userFactors")
 .sort($"userId" asc)
 .write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql")
 .mode("overwrite")
 .options(esConfig)
 .save("advancedspark/user-factors-als")
 
enrichedItemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"title", $"itemFactors", $"tags", $"img")
 .sort($"itemId" asc)
 .write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql")
 .mode("overwrite")
 .options(esConfig)
 .save("advancedspark/item-factors-als")

paragraphs.title: Calculate Confidence Given userId and ItemId
Show Top 5 Similar Items to a given item
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row
import com.advancedspark.ml.Similarity 

// Item 7
val givenItemId = 7
val givenItemFactors = itemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"itemFactors")
  .where($"itemId" === givenItemId)
  .map(row => row.getSeq[Double](1).toArray)
  .collect()(0)

// Convert Array[Double] to DoubleMatrix
val givenItemFactorsMatrix = new DoubleMatrix(givenItemFactors)

// Find Other Similar Items to the Given Item
val similarItems = itemFactorsDF.select($"itemId", $"itemFactors")
  .filter($"itemId" !== givenItemId)
  .map{ row =>
     val itemId = row.getInt(0)
     val otherItemFactors = row.getSeq[Double](1).toArray
     val otherItemFactorsMatrix = new DoubleMatrix(otherItemFactors)
     val similarity = Similarity.cosineSimilarity(otherItemFactorsMatrix, givenItemFactorsMatrix)
     (itemId, similarity)
  }
  
// Sort and Return Top 5 Items by Similarity to Given Item
val sortedSimilarItems = similarItems.top(5)(Ordering.by[(Int, Double), Double] { case (id, similarity) => similarity })

val sortedSimilarItemsDF = sqlContext.createDataFrame(sortedSimilarItems).toDF("similarItemId", "similarity")

val enrichedSortedSimilarItemsDF = 
   sortedSimilarItemsDF.join(itemsDF, $"similarItemId" === $"itemId")
   .select($"similarItemId", $"title", $"description", $"tags", $"img", $"similarity")
   .sort($"similarity" desc)
   
z.show(enrichedSortedSimilarItemsDF.select(lit(givenItemId).as("itemId"), $"similarItemId", $"title", $"similarity"))
